manifestor.anulunar_wisdom: Manifestors are here to start things that others will complete
manifestor.spiritual_role: Divine catalysts who initiate new cycles of collective growth

energy_dynamics.aura_quality: Closed and repelling - creates space for independent action
energy_dynamics.impact_on_others: Powerful presence that can intimidate or inspire

manifestor.life_theme: Creating impact through aligned action and authentic self-expression
manifestor.relationship_style: Need partners who respect their autonomy while offering emotional support
manifestor.career_guidance: Excel in roles requiring independence, innovation, and leadership

generator.anulunar_wisdom: Generators are the life force of humanity - honor your energy as sacred
generator.spiritual_role: Divine builders who create sustainable structures for collective thriving

energy_dynamics.aura_quality: Open and enveloping - draws others in
energy_dynamics.impact_on_others: Magnetic presence that energizes and attracts

head.name: Crown/Head Center
head.spiritual_function: Receiving cosmic downloads and universal questions
head.when_defined: Consistent access to mental inspiration and curiosity
head.when_undefined: Amplifies and filters mental pressures from environment
head.anulunar_wisdom: An open head center is like a cosmic radio - tune into the right frequency

1.name: The Creative
1.gift: Authentic creative expression that inspires others
1.shadow: Attempting to be different for attention rather than authenticity
1.siddhi: Pure creative force aligned with divine will
1.anulunar_wisdom: Gate 1 is about being yourself so fully that you give others permission to do the same
